titleText: Microsoft to renovate Silicon Valley campus
mainText: Microsoft is planning to rebuild much of its Silicon Valley office, the company said Tuesday, just days after announcing a major redevelopment of its Redmond headquarters. The software company will tear down three of its five.

titleText: Microsoft delivers public preview of its new Azure IoT software as a service
mainText: Microsoft is making available as of today, December 5, a public preview of its IoT software-as-a-service offering called Microsoft IoT Central. Microsoft IoT Central is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) offering for connecting physical devices to back- end services,.

titleText: Azure Container Instances vs. AWS Fargate

titleText: Windows Update is broken for some Windows 7 users
mainText: Windows 7 users are reporting problems accessing updates through Windows Update and Microsoft Update. The root of the problem may be an expiration date that Microsoft needs to fix on its side, noted Computerworld earlier today. A.

titleText: Windows 10 picked as 'initial' OS for Germany's new government client
mainText: The German government has begun work on a Windows 10-based workstation for federal employees. As reported by Heise Online, the German government decided in May 2015 to develop the Bundesclient, or federal client. The development began.

titleText: Gmail now works properly on iPhone X and supports third-party accounts
mainText: Google has finally released an updated version of its Gmail app that fills the entirety of Apple's iPhone X display. The update to the iOS app also adds support for third-party email services like Apple.
